About Me (CV)

I am a third-year PhD student at Department of Computer Science, University of California Irvine. Before that, I obtained my Master's degree in Software Engineering from School of Software, Tsinghua University in July, 2016, and my bachelor's degreee in Software Engineering from School of Software, Tongji University in July, 2013.

I'm working on database systems (specializing in storage management) under supervision of Professor Michael J. Carey.

Education

  • Department of Computer Science, University of California Irvine, 2016.9 - Present
    Doctor of Philosophy, Computer Science (4.00/4.00)
    Thesis: On Optimizing LSM-based Storage for Big Data Management Systems
  • School of Software, Tsinghua University, 2013.9 - 2016.7
    Master of Engineering, Software Engineering (94.1/100, 2 out of 136)
    Thesis: Policy-Based Privacy Checking for Big Data Analytics Systems
  • School of Software, Tongji University, 2009.9 - 2013.7
    Bachelor of Engineering, Software Engineering (4.72/5, 2 out of 169)
    Thesis: Design and Implementation of a Key-Value Storage System

Experience

  • Research Intern, Microsoft Research, 2019.6 - 2019.9
  • Research Intern, IBM Almaden Research Center, 2017.6 - 2017.9
    • Mentor: Pinar Tozun, Yuanyuan Tian. Manager: Fatma Ozcan
    • Worked on indexing management in Hybrid Transactional & Analytical Processing (HTAP) systems
  • Software Developer Intern, eBay China Development Center, 2012.7 - 2013.3

Selected Publications (Google Scholar)

  • Chen Luo, Michael J. Carey
    LSM-based Storage Techniques: A Survey
    VLDB Journal, to appear
  • Chen Luo, Michael J. Carey
    Efficient Data Ingestion and Query Processing for LSM-Based Storage Systems.
    Proceedings of the VLDB Endowment (PVLDB) 12(5), pp. 531-543, 2019
  • Chen Luo, Pinar Tözün, Yuanyuan Tian, Ronald Barber, Richard Sidle, and Vijayshankar Raman.
    Umzi: Unified Multi-Zone Indexing for Large-Scale HTAP.
    International Conference on Extending Database Technology (EDBT), pp. 1-12, 2019
  • Chen Luo, Fei He, Fei Peng, Dong Yan, Dan Zhang, Xin Zhou.
    PSpec-SQL: Enabling Fine-Grained Control for Distributed Data Analytics.
    IEEE Transactions on Dependable and Secure Computing (TDSC), 2019
  • Chen Luo, Fei He, and Carlo Ghezzi.
    Inferring Software Behavioral Models with MapReduce.
    In Science of Computer Programming, Volume 145, Pages 13-36, 2017

Awards

  • Graduate with Honor of Beijing, Tsinghua University, 2016
  • First Prize Scholarship of Tsinghua University, 2014, 2015
  • Graduate with Honor of Shanghai, Tongji University, 2013
  • Outstanding Student, Tongji University, 2010, 2011
  • First Prize Scholarship, Tongji University, 2011

Misc

  • Gallery contains a few photos taken by me and my girlfriend.
